description: Tower of Hanoi: using the optimal way to move an even number of disks from peg 0 to peg 2 or an odd number from peg 0 to peg 1, a(n) is the smallest disk on peg 0 after n moves.
example: Start by moving first disk from peg 0 to peg 1, second disk from peg 0 to peg 2, first disk from peg 1 to peg 2, etc. so sequence starts 1,2,3,3,...
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Apr 03 2001
